data.text: we stayed 5 nights and we had a wonderful holiday, thank to the super friendly staff ..always smiling and helpful! breakfast was great, very rich choice, salted and sweet for every flavour and habit...super good rates for high quality! Room size, bed size and cleaning was also perfect!! Overall great comfort. I strongly recommend this hotel!
data.title: Excellent!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It is a pleasure to receive your positive comments for Savoy Park Hotel. 

We are happy to learn that you had a pleasant stay and found our service standards to be consistent enough to merit continued visits to our hotel.

Constant efforts are put in to train our team on the importance of personalized and unobtrusive service. It is so encouraging to know that our team members are successfully delivering on this front. 

Your appreciation has been conveyed to all the staffs who all humbly thank you for the same. We hope to recreate the same experience for all your future visits.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text: Pocket friendly and spacious rooms only 1 lift working so waiting time is more the restaurant staff extremely good and polite always serving with a smile.The housekeeping guy Mr Ram hard working and polite rooms were done daily and kept clean.The front desk staff also good but one of them was rude and arrogant he had the guts to show me his name badge and told me complaint to who ever u want or write whatever u feel in the reveiw when I confronted him that this is not the way to speak to a guest.Small things happen and I have forgiven him.Overall experience v good.will surely recommend to my freinds and family.
data.title: Good and memorable trip with mom sister and brother.Sibling meet.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It is a pleasure to receive your positive comments for Savoy Park Hotel. 

We are happy to learn that you had a pleasant stay and found our service standards to be consistent enough to merit recommendations to your family and friends.

All our rooms are cleaned between 9 am and 6 am in a planned manner by the houseman in-charge of the floor. In case any guest wishes his room to be cleaned immediately, then a 'Clean My Room' hanger card can be placed outside the door or the guest could communicate directly with the Housekeeping Department or Reception over the phone.  Unfortunately, we have not received any instruction on any specific time to clean your room. 

We regret the misunderstanding and altercation between the staff member and you on the above incident.

Your appreciation has been conveyed to all the staffs who all humbly thank you for the same. We hope to recreate the same experience for all your future visits.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text:
The hotel is very nice with reasonably sized cozy rooms and fluffy beds and pillows. The staff is very courteous and always happy to help you with a smile. Decent breakfast with good veg options for people like us. 

Overall a very good experience. I would prefer staying again at the property and also recommend this place for a decent and reasonable stay.
data.title: Recommended property to stay in Bur Dubai.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

The entire team at Savoy Park thank you for taking time to post your experience. 

Your compliments for our services have been shared with all the staffs. We are delighted to learn that we could make your stay memorable. 

It is our constant endeavor to deliver our best. Your appreciation increases our motivation to continually aspire to meet and exceed the guests’ expectations. 

The Savoy Hotels, with its convenient location in the centre of the city in Dubai, is close to the business, financial and shopping arcades, making it an ideal hotel both for a business traveller as well as for a family get-away.

We look forward to welcome you back soon.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny. 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text: Our stay at Savoy Park Hotel Apartments in March was overall excellent. The breakfast was exceptional, especially for Indian vegetarian guests. The hotel offers convenient free bus services to La Mer Beach, Outlet Mall, and other attractions. We enjoyed the swimming pool and the Jacuzzi on the 8th floor. However, we encountered an unpleasant odor coming from the toilet in our room, which was the only downside to our experience. Despite this, we had a wonderful time and are eager to return to this hotel in the near future.
data.title: Good Hotel to stay at Al Karama, Dubai

user_location.name: Surbiton, Kingston upon Thames, Greater London, England

Savoy Hotels – Dubai

data.text:
A very comfortable studio apartment with all I needed for the 3 days I was there. Staff were so helpful, nothing was any trouble ever. It was all perfect and I will be going back there again. Not far from the airport and from Dubai Mall. 
I was able to bring food back from the Mall and reheat when I needed to. Had a huge fridge and very roomy and comfortable bathroom with a walkin shower, which was a must have for me.
I would recommend this apartment for any short stay, or even longer!!
I will be back..
data.title: A short stay at Savory Park Aparments

owner_response.title: Owner response

The staffs are humbled with your high ratings and recognition which inspires all of us to deliver service of excellence.

We appreciate the opportunity you have given us to serve you and we look forward to host you back at the Savoy Park Hotel centrally located in Dubai, being close to BurJuman Mall and the Metro stations.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny. 
Group General Manager. 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai.
